resources.string: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
Failed authenticating with that instance. If this persists, try "Login in Browser" from the menu.
Couldn\'t find a web browser to use.
An unidentified authorization error occurred. If this persists, try "Login in Browser" from the menu.
Authorization was denied. If you\'re sure that you supplied the correct credentials, try "Login in Browser" from the menu.
Failed getting a login token. If this persists, try "Login in Browser" from the menu.
Could not load the login page.
Video and audio files cannot exceed %1$s MB in size.
The image could not be edited.
That type of file cannot be uploaded.
That file could not be opened.
Permission to read media is required.
Permission to store media is required.
Images and videos cannot both be attached to the same post.
This instance does not support following hashtags.
Failed to load the status source from the server.
Nothing here. Pull down to refresh!
Are you sure you want to log out of %1$s? This will delete all local data of the account, including drafts and preferences.

plurals.name: action_post_failed_detail
plurals.item: Your post failed to upload and has been saved to drafts.\n\nEither the server could not be contacted, or it rejected the post.
Your posts failed to upload and have been saved to drafts.\n\nEither the server could not be contacted, or it rejected the posts.

resources.string:
The address or domain of any instance can be entered here, such as mastodon.social, icosahedron.website, social.tchncs.de, and more!

If you don't yet have an account, you can enter the name of the instance you'd like to join and create an account there.

An instance is a single place where your account is hosted, but you can easily communicate with and follow folks on other instances as though you were on the same site.

More info can be found at joinmastodon.org.
Are you sure you want to block all of %1$s? You will not see content from that domain in any public timelines or in your notifications. Your followers from that domain will be removed.
Unlisted: Do not show in public timelines
Direct: Post to mentioned users only
Show colorful gradients for hidden media
The pre-selected privacy will depend on the post you are replying to.
Always mark media as sensitive (synced with server)
Notifications when your posts get boosted
Notifications when your posts get marked as favorite
Notifications about polls that have ended
Notifications when somebody you\'re subscribed to published a new post
Notifications when posts you\'ve interacted with are edited
Notifications when Tusky is working in the background
Other notifications, like lost connections and moderation warnings
Admin notifications, like new reports or signups
Tusky is free and open-source software. It is licensed under the GNU General Public License Version 3. You can view the license here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html
Always expand posts marked with content warnings
When the keyword or phrase is alphanumeric only, it will only be applied if it matches the whole word
Failed to add the account to the list
Failed to remove the account from the list

plurals.item: Describe contents for visually impaired (%1$d character limit)

resources.string: Tap or drag the circle to choose the focal point which will always be visible in thumbnails.
Requires you to manually approve followers
Save draft? (Attachments will be uploaded again when you restore the draft.)
A copy of the post has been saved to your drafts
Your instance %1$s does not have any custom emojis
You\'ll need to download these emoji sets first
You\'ll need to restart Tusky in order to apply these changes
The Blob emojis known from Android 4.4–7.1
Tusky contains code and assets from the following open source projects:
Licensed under the Apache License (copy below)
Information below may reflect the user\'s profile incompletely. Press to open full profile in browser.
Works in most cases. No data is leaked to other apps.
May support additional authentication methods, but requires a supported browser.
Are you sure you want to permanently clear all your notifications?
A poll you have voted in has ended
A poll you created has ended
The report will be sent to your server moderators. You can provide an explanation of why you are reporting this account below:
The account is from another server. Send an anonymized copy of the report there as well?
Enable swipe gesture to switch between tabs
You don\'t have any scheduled posts.
Mastodon has a minimum scheduling interval of 5 minutes.
Hide the title of the top toolbar
Your private note about this account

Some information that might affect your mental wellbeing will be hidden. This includes: 

- Favorite/Boost/Follow notifications 
- Favorite/Boost count on posts 
- Follower/Post stats on profiles 

Push-notifications will not be affected, but you can review your notification preferences manually.

plurals.name: error_upload_max_media_reached
plurals.item: You cannot upload more than %1$d media attachment.
You cannot upload more than %1$d media attachments.

resources.string: Do you really want to delete the list %1$s?
The post you drafted a reply to has been removed
Even though your account is not locked, the %1$s staff thought you might want to review follow requests from these accounts manually.
By logging in you agree to the rules of %1$s.
Your server knows that this post was edited, but does not have a copy of the edits, so they can\'t be shown to you.\n\nThis is Mastodon issue #25398.
Contacting your server took too long

This is your home timeline. It shows the recent posts of the accounts you follow.\n\nTo explore accounts you can either discover them in one of the other timelines. For example the local timeline of your instance [iconics gmd_group]. Or you can search them by name [iconics gmd_search]; for example search for Tusky to find our Mastodon account.

Here are your private messages; sometimes called conversations or direct messages (DM).

Private messages are created by setting the visibility [iconics gmd_public] of a post to [iconics gmd_mail] Direct and mentioning one or more users in the text.

For example you can start on the profile view of an account and tap the create button [iconics gmd_edit] and change the visibility.

This is your lists view. You can define a number of private lists and add accounts to that.

NOTE that you can only add accounts you follow to your lists.

These lists can be used as a tab in Account preferences [iconics gmd_account_circle] [iconics gmd_navigate_next] Tabs.
Do you want to save your profile changes?
Including people who have been following you fewer than 3 days
Filtered unless it\'s in reply to your own mention or if you follow the sender
This feature is only supported on Mastodon servers running v4.3.0 or later.
Notifications from %1$d people you may know
An admin from %1$s has suspended %2$s, which means you can no longer receive updates from them or interact with them.
An admin from %1$s has blocked %2$s, including %3$s of your followers and %4$s you follow.
You have blocked %1$s, removing %2$s of your followers and %3$s you follow.
You have received a moderation warning.
Some of your posts have been removed.
Some of your posts have been marked as sensitive.
Your account has received a moderation warning.
Your posts will be marked as sensitive from now on.

Tusky does not recognize this notification type and can\'t show it to you. Your server\'s web interface may be able to do so. Please also inform the Tusky developers so they can add support for this type!
